title: [FR] Ability to log custom params while training a model

labels.name: area/recipes
labels.description: MLflow Recipes, Recipes APIs, Recipes configs, Recipe Templates

body:
### Willingness to contribute

Yes. I can contribute this feature independently.

### Proposal Summary

Currently we are able to log custom metrics while training a model using MLflow recipes. There is currently no easy way to log custom params outside of autologging ones. It would be great to log custom params as well or configure which params are logged from autologging. 

### Motivation

> #### What is the use case for this feature?
Log custom params while training a model

> #### Why is this use case valuable to support for MLflow users in general?
Users would be able to pick and choose which params are logged instead of auto logged ones or also be able to add new custom params.

> #### Why is it currently difficult to achieve this use case?
Currently the only way to achieve this is a grab the run_id and log params using it. Its an after step after training. So rather add a config similar to custom_metrics to make it easier to do it. 


### Details

_No response_
